title: Five-spice pork
ingredients: ['400 g (14 oz) pork fillet, trimmed of fat', '250 g (8 ½ oz) medium Chinese egg noodles', '1 tbsp sunflower oil', '1 large onion, finely chopped', '1 large garlic clove, crushed', '1 tbsp five-spice powder', '300 g (10 ½ oz) mange-tout or sugarsnap peas', '2 large red peppers (or 1 red and 1 yellow or orange), seeded and thinly sliced', '120 ml (4 fl oz) hot vegetable stock', 'salt and pepper', 'fresh coriander leaves to garnish']
